swipedata.title: CLAIM
swipedata.message: Claim your certificate from issuers, partnered with alFolio in just a few taps. It's easy such as 2+2

swipedata.title: SEND
swipedata.message: Send your certificate to anyone and they won't need to verify it again. It's algorithm not a theorem.

swipedata.title: Authenticate
swipedata.message: alFolio ensures end-to-end encryption and zero data tempering. hacking efforts would be 5/0
